snippet: Timothy V. Johnson, a six-term congressman of Illinois, will not continue his re-election bid, despite winning the Republican Party nomination in a primary last month.
abstract: Timothy V. Johnson, a six-term congressman of Illinois, will not continue his re-election bid, despite winning the Republican Party nomination in a primary last month.

headline.main: Illinois Representative Will Drop Re-election Bid
headline.print_headline: The House: A Candidate No More
